name: Great Sword
description:
You are a demigod who's power was partially stripped away. After being freed by another power, you use your growing equipment to slay your captors.

WASD - Move
J - Attack
K - Block
L - Super Attack
P/Esc - Pause
(arrow keys do some developer stuff, left them in on accident lol)

As you use your sword and shield, they grow in size and power.
